channel.title: RazorScapeRSPS | Looking for staff | brand new started 10.4.2015!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/jkaR2FO.png[/img] [b]We are Simply The Best[/b]
[size=10pt][u]Website/Forums[/u][/size] http://razorscape.moonfruit.com/
[size=10pt][u]Play Razor Scape now![/u][/size] https://www.dropbox.com/s/vlmbognll6t5065/RazorScape.jar?dl=0
[b][u][size=10pt]Razorscape Features:[/size][/u][/b]
- All 25 Skills Work 100% - Custom Content, Unique Home Like No Other - Flowering & Dicing for Hosting Gambling - 100% Pet System Like Runescape - Teleport Hub System (Portals) - All Bosses with good Drop Rates - Server Notified when Users get a good Drop - Squeal Of Fortune Working 100% Like RuneScape Showing Bought, Earned & Daily Spins. - Warrior Guild with Defender Drops - Nice ways to make money - Much much more come online to find out more! - Clan Chat System - Dungeoneering - Working Notes
[size=10pt][b][u]Media[/u][/b][/size]
[u]Awesome Home![/u]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/v0DARAA.jpg[/img]
[u][size=10pt]Awesome Donator Zone with a great shop! (Donor zone not fully completed) Donors got their own way of getting dung points![/size][/u]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/7AB6xJ9.jpg[/img]
[size=10pt][u]Viewing Players Stats[/u][/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/7WdgkVT.png[/img]
[size=10pt][u]All Skills Working![/u][/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/6Sjc31O.png[/img]
[size=10pt][u]Wildy Teleports![/u][/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/OD0JGVB.png[/img]
[size=10pt][u]PvM Teleports![/u][/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/f2fJT9T.png[/img]
[size=10pt][u]Server's Statistics[/u][/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/I1EH3zP.png[/img]
^ EVERYTHING WILL BE UPDATED AND SERVER WILL BE BETTER!! I PROMISE.[/center]
